alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 7:35PM CDT until April 27 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northeastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adams, or 19 miles east of Guymon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hooker, Turpin, Bryans Corner, Baker, Adams and Boyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
